==Japanese==

===Kanji===

=====Readings=====
* {{ja-readings|goon=[[え]] (e)|kanon=[[わ]] (wa), [[わい]] (wai)|kanyoon=[[あ]] (a)|kun=[[かえる]] (kaeru), [[かわず]] (kawazu)}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|かえる|yomi=k}}
/kaheru/: [kaperu] → [kaɸeru] → [kaweru] → [kaeru]. The loss of the medial -w- is due to the following -e as Japanese ceased to distinguish between /e, we/.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|かえる|acc=h|acc_ref=NHK|y=k}}

====Noun====
[[File:Agalychnis callidryas.jpg|thumb]]
{{ja-noun|かえる|hhira=かへる}}

# [[frog]]

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|かわず|yomi=k}}
/kahazu/: [kapazu] → [kaɸazu] → [kawazu].

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|かわず|acc=h|acc_ref=NHK|y=k}}
